title_onboarding1: Find Your Next Favorite Movie Here
desc_onboarding1: Get access to a huge library of movies to suit all tastes. You will surely like it.
desc_onboarding2: Explore a vast collection of movies in all qualities and genres. Find your next favorite film with ease.
desc_onboarding3: Discover movies from every genre, in all available qualities. Find something new and exciting to watch every day.
desc_onboarding4: Save movies to your watchlist to keep track of what you want to watch next. Enjoy films in various qualities and genres.
desc_onboarding5: Share your thoughts on the movies you've watched. Dive deep into film details and help others discover great movies with your reviews.
